Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class MessageHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.MessageHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObserverHandler
public class MessageHandler extends Object implements ObserverHandler
Class which handles a single message from the server within a separate thread

    • notifyPlayCharacterObservers

      public void notifyPlayCharacterObservers(CharacterName name, Color color, Integer island, List<Color> srcStudents, List<Color> dstStudents)
      Description copied from interface: ObserverHandler
      Notifies all the attached observers that the user has played a character
      Specified by:
      notifyPlayCharacterObservers in interface ObserverHandler
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the played character
      color - the color needed for the character effect to develop
      island - the index of the island needed for the character effect to develop
      srcStudents - the students to move/swap
      dstStudents - the students to eventually swap with srcStudents
